058051e1-423f-4b17-a826-0f12d81fa2a4.description: With 27 years of history, the Asialink Leaders Program is Australia’s premier program for Asia capable leaders. Earners are equipped with the insights, capabilities and connections to navigate complex foreign policy, business, cultural, political, ethical and regulatory environments. As a result, they are now equipped to make better decisions for organisation success in the fast-changing Indo-Pacific region.
058051e1-423f-4b17-a826-0f12d81fa2a4.name: Asialink Leaders Program

badge_template_activities.title: Completed a 3-day Foundation week, building country-specific knowledge of key Asian societies and insights into those contemporary opportunities and challenges that shape the bilateral relationship with Australia
Developed their individual Asia capabilities with cross-cultural negotiation skills and tangible communication channels and tools with Asia
Explored a range of key topics including, disruptive innovation in Asia and geo-strategic issues impacting Australia’s engagement with the region

Immersed themselves in a 4-day intensive Summit, exploring Asia-engagement through the federal lens, to understand the context for our strategic, foreign, economic and trade, industry and innovation policies. Leaders Program participants have engaged with leading academic experts, senior business executives, ministers and shadow ministers, and civil servants to expand and deepen their ability to contribute at the most senior levels
Undertaken a practical, guided, Asia-focused workplace project that applies the skills and knowledge they gained to the context of their work

80bb82a4-b43d-4738-ad80-88bb943d1263.description: Supported by The National Foundation for Australia-China Relations and in partnership with Austrade, The China Digital Economy Academy program delivered by Asialink Business builds the capability of Australian brands and SMEs to succeed in China’s digital economy. Earners are equipped with an understanding of China’s rapidly evolving digital landscape, an understanding of Chinese business culture and gained exclusive access to leading experts.
80bb82a4-b43d-4738-ad80-88bb943d1263.name: Asialink Business: The China Digital Economy Academy

badge_template_activities.title: Completed a minimum of 4 modules of the program
Explored topics across China’s eCommerce platforms, Chinese digital and mobile consumers, digital and social marketing, eCommerce strategies and business culture.

2a9b765d-991e-44fb-98d1-dcd9ae31480b.description: Supported by The National Foundation for Australia-China Relations and in partnership with Austrade, The China Digital Economy Academy program delivered by Asialink Business builds the capability of Australian brands and SMEs to succeed in China’s digital economy. Earners are equipped with an understanding of China’s rapidly evolving eCommerce platforms, positioned to stand out in this fast-paced digital landscape, built practical capabilities and gained exclusive access to leading experts.
2a9b765d-991e-44fb-98d1-dcd9ae31480b.name: Asialink Business: The China Digital Economy Academy

badge_template_activities.title: Completed all 7 modules of the program that included 4 eCommerce and 3 China business culture capability modules
Explored topics including China’s eCommerce platforms, understanding Chinese digital and mobile consumers, digital and social marketing in China, and cross border eCommerce strategies for China.
Developed their cross-cultural negotiation skills and tangible communication channels and tools when engaging with stakeholders from China
